title: Practice with Expected Value
body: Let the random variable X $$=$$ the number of times a newborn baby's crying wakes its mother after midnight. Below, we've listed $$x$$, the possible outcomes for X, P(x), $$x P\left(x\right)$$, and (x-\mu)**2*P(x).\n##figure1.gif
lesson: 4.2 Mean or Expected Value and Standard Deviation
